feed.title: Plex Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.63
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Linting cleanup by @antanst in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/99
  • Config fixes by @antanst in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/100

New Contributors

  • @antanst made their first contribution in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/99

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.62...v0.63

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.65
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.64...v0.65

  • New create button and inbox quick capture
  • Keyboard shortcuts
  • Fix an issue with project details page crashing If due date was set up

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.69
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add correct placeholder for project description by @arnopensource in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/147
  • Added 24 UI languages in total !

New Contributors

  • @arnopensource made their first contribution in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/147

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.68...v0.69

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.70
entry.content:
Bug fixes: Fixed a bug with migrations not running automatically on update

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.69...v0.70
